```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
figs = c(
"[![](figures/abj.png){width=250px}](http://www.abj.org.br/)",

)
descrs = c("Develop applications of statistics to the law.", 
           "Study inductive statistical methods, with special interest in foundational issues.", 
           "Develop the new mathematics needed to construct a theory of the brain accounting for the experimental data gathered by neuroscience research.", 
           "Combine statistics and machine learning to create improved solutions to relevant real-world problems.")
knitr::kable(tibble::tibble(Group = figs, Goal = descrs))
```

### Journal papers

```{r echo = FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
paper_table = yaml::read_yaml("tables/papers_journal.yaml") %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  tidyr::unnest() %>%
  tibble::as.tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(title = paste0("<a href='",
                               url,
                               "'>",
                               title,
                               "</a>")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-url) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(journal = paste0("<b>",
                                 journal,
                                 "</b>"))
DT::datatable(paper_table,
              escape = FALSE,
              options = list(dom = 'ftip'),
              rownames = FALSE)
```

### Papers in Conference Proceedings

```{r echo = FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
paper_table = yaml::read_yaml("tables/papers_conference.yaml") %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  tidyr::unnest() %>%
  tibble::as.tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(title = paste0("<a href='",
                               url,
                               "'>",
                               title,
                               "</a>")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-url) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(proceedings = paste0("<b>",
                                     proceedings,
                                     "</b>"))
DT::datatable(paper_table,
              escape = FALSE,
              options = list(dom = 't'),
              rownames = FALSE)
```
